title: Ep. 107 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description:
SPONSORS: - Download the DraftKings Sportsbook app now, use promo code BEARS, bet ONE DOLLAR on either team to score and win ONE HUNDRED DOLLARS IN FREE BETS. - Earn your bragging rights with Zingeroo by going to https://apps.zingeroo.com/2Bears - Head on over to https://Stance.com and pick out whatever styles you like. Enjoy the color and comfort of a life less ordinary… with Stance. - Head to https://PolicyGenius.com/CAVE to get started right now. Policygenius. When it comes to insurance, it’s nice to get it right. - Get 20% off your order at https://BuyRaycon.com/bears - Go to https://WHOOP.com and use code “CAVE” at checkout to save yourself 15% off today. - Get 10% off your first month of online therapy at https://BetterHelp.com/BEARS. - Go to https://DietSmoke.com and use the promo code “BEARS” for 20% off your order.

Pretty wild episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave with Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer this week! Bert went to ye olde sex shoppe in Austin and brought back a bunch of toys for the bears to try out and review! Pumps, plugs, and mold of Christy Mack! Do we need to get Christy's permission to use it? Lets reach out either way! Bert realizes that him and Tom live VERY different lives on the road. We try and figure out how Bert is still alive and if a perspective adjustment is in order. We get into all the insecurities that come with being a comedian and how some people handle them. We then get back into ladies that worked in the adult industry for a couple months that blew up from that. The bears share the difficulties doing improv podcasts and radio appearances.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
